% & & &\underline{倾向于看好}~\textit{inclined to bullish on} &\underline{倾向于看好}~\textit{inclined to bullish on} \\
% & & &倾向于看豪~\textit{inclined to look at luxury} &倾向与看好~\textit{tendency and optimism} \\
% & & &倾向于看号~\textit{inclined to look at numbers} &倾向于刊号~\textit{tend to issue number} \\
% &\makebox[0.07\textwidth][r]{\textbf{Context:}} 奥斯卡组委会 & &倾向与看好~\textit{tendency and optimism} &倾向于看豪~\textit{inclined to look at luxury} \\
% &\textit{The Oscar Organizing Committee} & &倾向于看郝~\textit{inclined to look at Hao} &倾向于看昊~\textit{inclined to look at Hao} \\
% & & &\multicolumn{2}{c}{{\textbf{Abbreviated Input:}} q x y k h} \\\cmidrule{4-5}
% &\makebox[0.07\textwidth][r]{\textbf{Target:}} 倾向于看好 & &旗下一款很~\textit{one of its brands very} &\underline{倾向于看好}~\textit{inclined to bullish on} \\
% & \textit{inclined to bullish on}& &旗下一款豪~\textit{one of its luxury brands} &倾向于抗衡~\textit{inclined to fight against}  \\

% & & &旗下一款号~\textit{one of its brands being} &倾向于口号~\textit{inclined to slogans} \\

% % && &GPT &PinyinGPT & &GPT &PinyinGPT \\\cmidrule{4-8}
% % & & &\underline{礼拜一有点事} &礼拜一有电视 & &老佛爷一定是 &老板永远都是 \\
% % &\makebox[0.07\textwidth][r]{\textbf{Target:}} 礼拜一有点事 & &礼拜一有电视 &\underline{礼拜一有点事} & &老佛爷说的是 &脸部永远都是 \\

% % & \makebox[0.07\textwidth][r]{\textbf{Target:}} 永远都是&  &永远都市 &永远斗士 & &由于当时 &永远单身 \\
